text: Orca deployed updated CLMM program with Token-2022 transfer-hook support on mainnet. Program ID: whirLbMiicVdio4qvUfM5KAg6Ct8VwpYzGff3uctyCc. This enables concentrated liquidity pools to natively support Token Extensions including transfer fees and confidential transfers.

Firedancer validator nodes processed 18.2% of mainnet slots over the past 24 hours, up from 11.4% two weeks ago. Average block production latency 128ms vs 195ms for Agave nodes. Network TPS peaked at 9,842 during this period.

Jupiter aggregator 7-day volume surpassed $14.2B, setting a new ATH. The JUP token buyback vault accumulated 12.4M JUP ($38.7M) from fee revenue. Top traded pairs: SOL/USDC (32%), JUP/SOL (8.7%), WIF/SOL (5.2%).

Rig AI Agent Registry program deployed to mainnet. Registered 247 autonomous agents with on-chain identity, capability declarations, and staking requirements. Agents must stake minimum 100 SOL to register and can be slashed for misbehavior.

Helium Mobile onboarded 14,200 new hotspots in the past 14 days, bringing total network to 1.24M active hotspots. Data credit burn rate hit 847M DC/day ($8.47M equivalent), up 42% from prior period. Coverage now spans 94% of US metro areas.

Render Network RNDR token on Solana saw 3.2M tokens burned in the past week as GPU compute demand surged. Active GPU nodes increased to 42,800. Compute job completion rate at 99.7% with average render time down 18% from baseline.
Eclipse mainnet SVM L2 on Ethereum processed 1.84M transactions in the past 24 hours. Celestia DA blob submissions averaged 2.3MB per block. Active addresses hit 312K daily, with bridge TVL at $890M.

Metaplex Bubblegum v2.1 program deployed with support for batch minting up to 1M compressed NFTs in a single Merkle tree. New instruction set allows direct metadata updates without re-minting. Compatible with Token Extensions metadata pointer.

Drift Protocol perpetual futures open interest reached $2.1B, with 24h volume at $4.8B. The insurance fund grew to $124M. New BTC-PERP and ETH-PERP markets saw particularly strong activity with 340K unique traders in the past week.

Circle migrated USDC on Solana to Token-2022 standard with confidential transfer extension enabled. 4.2B USDC tokens minted under new program authority. Transfer hooks now enforce compliance checks for institutional accounts.

AI agent MEV searcher bots accounted for 7.3% of Jito bundle tips over the past 7 days, totaling 4,120 SOL in tips paid. Top agent 'ArbitrageGPT-v3' executed 18,400 profitable trades with 94.2% success rate. Agent-originated transactions growing 23% week-over-week.

MarginFi total deposits surpassed $3.8B with lending TVL at $2.1B. SOL lending rates averaged 6.2% APY driven by leverage demand. New isolated lending markets for AI agent tokens (RIG, OLAS, AI16Z) launched with conservative LTV ratios.

DRiP Haus minted 2.4M compressed NFTs in a single week, distributing creator collectibles to 890K unique wallets. Total cNFTs on Solana surpassed 1.2B. Average mint cost per cNFT: $0.00032, down 40% from concurrent tree optimizations.

Firedancer validator set expanded to 480 nodes representing 22.8% of total stake. Network achieved sustained 11,200 TPS during a Tensor NFT mint event with zero missed slots from Firedancer nodes. Vote latency averaged 84ms, 56% faster than Agave.

Hivemapper HONEY token daily burn reached 1.8M tokens as mapping contributor payouts scaled. 42,000 active dashcam contributors mapped 28M km of roads globally. AI map freshness score improved to 94.2% for top-100 US cities.

Switchboard deployed AI Oracle v3 program allowing autonomous agents to submit and verify off-chain computation results on-chain. 84 registered AI oracle feeds providing price, sentiment, and risk-score data. TEE attestation required for all agent submissions.
